Path: src/main/kotlin/com/baoxin/cleanarchhelper/services/DirectoryCreatorService.kt
 1	package com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper.services
 2	
 3	import com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper.model.DirectoryStructure
 4	import com.intellij.openapi.application.ApplicationManager
 5	import com.intellij.openapi.project.Project
 6	import com.intellij.openapi.vfs.VirtualFile
 7	import com.intellij.openapi.vfs.VfsUtil
 8	import com.intellij.openapi.command.WriteCommandAction
 9	import java.io.IOException
 10	
 11	/**
 12	 * 目录创建服务
 13	 * 负责根据配置创建目录结构
 14	 */
 15	class DirectoryCreatorService {
 16	 
 17	 /**
 18	 * 在指定目录下创建目录结构
 19	 */
 20	 fun createDirectoryStructure(
 21	 project: Project,
 22	 baseDirectory: VirtualFile,
 23	 structure: DirectoryStructure,
 24	 onProgress: ((String) -> Unit)? = null,
 25	 onComplete: ((Boolean, String?) -> Unit)? = null
 26	 ) {
 27	 ApplicationManager.getApplication().invokeLater {
 28	 WriteCommandAction.runWriteCommandAction(project) {
 29	 try {
 30	 createDirectoriesRecursively(baseDirectory, structure, onProgress)
 31	 onComplete?.invoke(true, null)
 32	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 33	 onComplete?.invoke(false, e.message)
 34	 }
 35	 }
 36	 }
 37	 }
 38	 
 39	 /**
 40	 * 递归创建目录
 41	 */
 42	 private fun createDirectoriesRecursively(
 43	 parentDir: VirtualFile,
 44	 structure: DirectoryStructure,
 45	 onProgress: ((String) -> Unit)? = null
 46	 ) {
 47	 for ((dirName, subStructure) in structure.directories) {
 48	 onProgress?.invoke("创建目录: ${parentDir.path}/$dirName")
 49	 
 50	 val newDir = try {
 51	 parentDir.findChild(dirName) ?: parentDir.createChildDirectory(this, dirName)
 52	 } catch (e: IOException) {
 53	 throw IOException("无法创建目录: ${parentDir.path}/$dirName - ${e.message}")
 54	 }
 55	 
 56	 // 递归创建子目录
 57	 if (!subStructure.isLeaf()) {
 58	 createDirectoriesRecursively(newDir, subStructure, onProgress)
 59	 }
 60	 }
 61	 }
 62	 
 63	 /**
 64	 * 创建 Feature 模块
 65	 */
 66	 fun createFeatureModule(
 67	 project: Project,
 68	 baseDirectory: VirtualFile,
 69	 featureName: String,
 70	 structure: DirectoryStructure,
 71	 onProgress: ((String) -> Unit)? = null,
 72	 onComplete: ((Boolean, String?) -> Unit)? = null
 73	 ) {
 74	 ApplicationManager.getApplication().invokeLater {
 75	 WriteCommandAction.runWriteCommandAction(project) {
 76	 try {
 77	 // 规范化 Feature 名称
 78	 val normalizedName = normalizeFeatureName(featureName)
 79	 onProgress?.invoke("创建 Feature 模块: $normalizedName")
 80	 
 81	 // 创建 Feature 根目录
 82	 val featureDir = baseDirectory.findChild(normalizedName) 
 83	 ?: baseDirectory.createChildDirectory(this, normalizedName)
 84	 
 85	 // 创建 Feature 内部结构
 86	 createDirectoriesRecursively(featureDir, structure, onProgress)
 87	 
 88	 onComplete?.invoke(true, null)
 89	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 90	 onComplete?.invoke(false, e.message)
 91	 }
 92	 }
 93	 }
 94	 }
 95	 
 96	 /**
 97	 * 规范化 Feature 名称
 98	 * 转换为小写，用下划线分隔
 99	 */
 100	 private fun normalizeFeatureName(name: String): String {
 101	 return name.trim()
 102	 .replace(Regex("[\\s-]+"), "_") // 空格和连字符转为下划线
 103	 .replace(Regex("[^a-zA-Z0-9_]"), "") // 移除特殊字符
 104	 .lowercase()
 105	 }
 106	 
 107	 /**
 108	 * 检查目录是否已存在
 109	 */
 110	 fun checkDirectoryExists(baseDirectory: VirtualFile, dirName: String): Boolean {
 111	 return baseDirectory.findChild(dirName) != null
 112	 }
 113	 
 114	 /**
 115	 * 获取目录结构预览
 116	 */
 117	 fun getStructurePreview(structure: DirectoryStructure, prefix: String = ""): List<String> {
 118	 return structure.getAllPaths(prefix)
 119	 }
 120	 
 121	 /**
 122	 * 验证目录名称
 123	 */
 124	 fun validateDirectoryName(name: String): Pair<Boolean, String?> {
 125	 if (name.isBlank()) {
 126	 return false to "目录名称不能为空"
 127	 }
 128	 
 129	 if (name.contains(Regex("[<>:\"/\\\\|?*]"))) {
 130	 return false to "目录名称包含非法字符"
 131	 }
 132	 
 133	 if (name.length > 255) {
 134	 return false to "目录名称过长"
 135	 }
 136	 
 137	 return true to null
 138	 }
 139	 
 140	 companion object {
 141	 /**
 142	 * 获取服务实例
 143	 */
 144	 fun getInstance(): DirectoryCreatorService {
 145	 return DirectoryCreatorService()
 146	 }
 147	 }
 148	}

 15	/**

 17	 */
 18	class CreateFeatureAction : AnAction() {
 19	 
 20	 override fun actionPerformed(e: AnActionEvent) {
 21	 val project = e.project ?: return
 22	 val selectedFile = e.getData(CommonDataKeys.VIRTUAL_FILE) ?: return
 23	 
 24	 // 确保选择的是目录
 25	 val targetDirectory = if (selectedFile.isDirectory) {
 26	 selectedFile
 27	 } else {
 28	 selectedFile.parent ?: return
 29	 }
 30	 
 31	 // 显示 Feature 名称输入对话框
 32	 val dialog = FeatureNameDialog(project)
 33	 if (!dialog.showAndGet()) {
 34	 return
 35	 }
 36	 
 37	 val featureName = dialog.getFeatureName()
 38	 if (featureName.isBlank()) {
 39	 Messages.showWarningDialog(project, "Feature 名称不能为空", "输入错误")
 40	 return
 41	 }
 42	 
 43	 // 验证目录名称
 44	 val creatorService = DirectoryCreatorService.getInstance()
 45	 val (isValid, errorMessage) = creatorService.validateDirectoryName(featureName)

 48	 return
 49	 }
 50	 
 51	 // 检查是否已存在同名目录
 52	 if (creatorService.checkDirectoryExists(targetDirectory, featureName)) {
 53	 val result = Messages.showYesNoDialog(
 54	 project,
 55	 "目录 '$featureName' 已存在，是否继续？\n\n这可能会在现有目录中创建新的子目录。",
 56	 "目录已存在",
 57	 Messages.getWarningIcon()
 58	 )
 59	 if (result != Messages.YES) {
 60	 return
 61	 }
 62	 }
 63	 
 64	 // 获取配置服务
 65	 val configService = StructureConfigService.getInstance()
 66	 val featureStructure = configService.getFeatureStructure()
 67	 
 68	 // 显示确认对话框
 69	 val structurePreview = creatorService.getStructurePreview(featureStructure, featureName)
 70	 val previewText = structurePreview.take(10).joinToString("\n") + 
 71	 if (structurePreview.size > 10) "\n... 还有 ${structurePreview.size - 10} 个目录" else ""
 72	 
 73	 val result = Messages.showYesNoDialog(
 74	 project,
 75	 "将创建 Feature 模块：$featureName\n\n" +
 76	 "目标目录: ${targetDirectory.path}\n\n" +
 77	 "将创建的目录结构：\n$previewText\n\n" +
 78	 "是否继续？",
 79	 "创建 Feature 模块",
 80	 Messages.getQuestionIcon()
 81	 )
 82	 
 83	 if (result != Messages.YES) {
 84	 return
 85	 }
 86	 
 87	 // 在后台任务中创建 Feature 模块
 88	 ProgressManager.getInstance().run(object : Task.Backgroundable(project, "创建 Feature 模块: $featureName", true) {
 89	 override fun run(indicator: ProgressIndicator) {
 90	 indicator.isIndeterminate = false
 91	 indicator.fraction = 0.0
 92

 94	 var currentStep = 0

 1	package com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper.services
 2	
 3	import com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper.config.DefaultStructures
 4	import com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper.model.DirectoryStructure
 5	import com.intellij.openapi.application.ApplicationManager
 6	import com.intellij.openapi.components.PersistentStateComponent
 7	import com.intellij.openapi.components.Service
 8	import com.intellij.openapi.components.State
 9	import com.intellij.openapi.components.Storage
 10	import com.intellij.util.xmlb.XmlSerializerUtil
 11	
 12	/**
 13	 * 结构配置服务
 14	 * 负责管理和持久化目录结构配置
 15	 */
 16	@Service(Service.Level.APP)
 17	@State(
 18	 name = "CleanArchHelperSettings",
 19	 storages = [Storage("cleanArchHelper.xml")]
 20	)
 21	class StructureConfigService : PersistentStateComponent<StructureConfigService.State> {
 22	 
 23	 data class State(
 24	 var baseStructureJson: String = "",
 25	 var featureStructureJson: String = "",
 26	 var isFirstTime: Boolean = true
 27	 )
 28	 
 29	 private var myState = State()
 30	 
 31	 override fun getState(): State = myState
 32	 
 33	 override fun loadState(state: State) {
 34	 XmlSerializerUtil.copyBean(state, myState)
 35	 }
 36	 
 37	 /**
 38	 * 获取基础结构配置
 39	 */
 40	 fun getBaseStructure(): DirectoryStructure {
 41	 return if (myState.baseStructureJson.isNotEmpty()) {
 42	 DirectoryStructure.fromJson(myState.baseStructureJson)
 43	 } else {
 44	 DefaultStructures.getDefaultBaseStructure()
 45	 }
 46	 }
 47	 
 48	 /**
 49	 * 设置基础结构配置
 50	 */
 51	 fun setBaseStructure(structure: DirectoryStructure) {
 52	 myState.baseStructureJson = structure.toJson()
 53	 }
 54	 
 55	 /**
 56	 * 获取 Feature 结构配置
 57	 */
 58	 fun getFeatureStructure(): DirectoryStructure {
 59	 return if (myState.featureStructureJson.isNotEmpty()) {
 60	 DirectoryStructure.fromJson(myState.featureStructureJson)
 61	 } else {
 62	 DefaultStructures.getDefaultFeatureStructure()
 63	 }
 64	 }
 65	 
 66	 /**
 67	 * 设置 Feature 结构配置
 68	 */
 69	 fun setFeatureStructure(structure: DirectoryStructure) {
 70	 myState.featureStructureJson = structure.toJson()
 71	 }
 72	 
 73	 /**
 74	 * 重置为默认配置
 75	 */
 76	 fun resetToDefaults() {
 77	 myState.baseStructureJson = ""
 78	 myState.featureStructureJson = ""
 79	 }
 80	 
 81	 /**
 82	 * 检查是否为首次使用
 83	 */
 84	 fun isFirstTime(): Boolean = myState.isFirstTime
 85	 
 86	 /**
 87	 * 标记已不是首次使用
 88	 */
 89	 fun markNotFirstTime() {
 90	 myState.isFirstTime = false
 91	 }
 92	 
 93	 /**
 94	 * 根据项目类型获取推荐的基础结构
 95	 */
 96	 fun getRecommendedBaseStructure(projectType: String): DirectoryStructure {
 97	 return DefaultStructures.getRecommendedBaseStructure(projectType)
 98	 }
 99	 
 100	 companion object {
 101	 /**
 102	 * 获取服务实例
 103	 */
 104	 fun getInstance(): StructureConfigService {
 105	 return ApplicationManager.getApplication().getService(StructureConfigService::class.java)
 106	 }
 107	 }
 108	}

 3	import com.intellij.openapi.project.Project
 4	import com.intellij.openapi.ui.DialogWrapper
 5	import com.intellij.openapi.ui.ValidationInfo
 6	import com.intellij.ui.components.JBLabel
 7	import com.intellij.ui.components.JBTextField
 8	import com.intellij.util.ui.FormBuilder
 9	import java.awt.Dimension
 10	import javax.swing.JComponent
 11	import javax.swing.JPanel
 12	
 13	/**
 14	 * Feature 名称输入对话框
 15	 */
 16	class FeatureNameDialog(project: Project) : DialogWrapper(project) {
 17	 
 18	 private val featureNameField = JBTextField()
 19	 
 20	 init {
 21	 title = "创建 Feature 模块"
 22	 init()
 23	 
 24	 // 设置默认焦点
 25	 featureNameField.requestFocusInWindow()
 26	 }
 27	 
 28	 override fun createCenterPanel(): JComponent {
 29	 val panel = FormBuilder.createFormBuilder()
 30	 .addLabeledComponent(
 31	 JBLabel("Feature 名称:"),
 32	 featureNameField,
 33	 1,
 34	 false
 35	 )
 36	 .addComponentFillVertically(JPanel(), 0)
 37	 .panel
 38	 
 39	 panel.preferredSize = Dimension(400, 100)
 40	 
 41	 // 添加输入提示
 42	 featureNameField.toolTipText = "请输入 Feature 名称，支持字母、数字、下划线和连字符"
 43	 
 44	 return panel
 45	 }
 46	 
 47	 override fun getPreferredFocusedComponent(): JComponent {
 48	 return featureNameField
 49	 }
 50	 
 51	 /**
 52	 * 获取输入的 Feature 名称
 53	 */
 54	 fun getFeatureName(): String {
 55	 return featureNameField.text.trim()
 56	 }
 57	 
 58	 override fun doValidate(): ValidationInfo? {
 59	 val featureName = getFeatureName()
 60	 
 61	 if (featureName.isBlank()) {
 62	 return ValidationInfo("Feature 名称不能为空", featureNameField)
 63	 }
 64	 
 65	 if (featureName.length < 2) {
 66	 return ValidationInfo("Feature 名称至少需要2个字符", featureNameField)
 67	 }
 68	 
 69	 if (featureName.length > 50) {
 70	 return ValidationInfo("Feature 名称不能超过50个字符", featureNameField)
 71	 }
 72	 
 73	 // 检查是否包含非法字符
 74	 if (!featureName.matches(Regex("^[a-zA-Z0-9_\\-\\s]+$"))) {
 75	 return ValidationInfo("Feature 名称只能包含字母、数字、下划线、连字符和空格", featureNameField)
 76	 }
 77	 
 78	 // 检查是否以字母开头
 79	 if (!featureName.first().isLetter()) {
 80	 return ValidationInfo("Feature 名称必须以字母开头", featureNameField)
 81	 }
 82	 
 83	 return null
 84	 }
 85	}

Path: src/main/kotlin/com/baoxin/cleanarchhelper/actions/CreateFeatureAction.kt
 1	package com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper.actions
 2	
 3	import com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper.services.DirectoryCreatorService
 4	import com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper.services.StructureConfigService
 5	import com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper.ui.FeatureNameDialog
 6	import com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.AnAction
 7	import com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.AnActionEvent
 8	import com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.CommonDataKeys
 9	import com.intellij.openapi.progress.ProgressIndicator
 10	import com.intellij.openapi.progress.ProgressManager
 11	import com.intellij.openapi.progress.Task
 12	import com.intellij.openapi.ui.Messages
 13	import com.intellij.openapi.vfs.VirtualFile
 14	
 15	/**
 16	 * 创建 Feature 模块的 Action
 17	 */
 18	class CreateFeatureAction : AnAction() {
 19	 
 20	 override fun actionPerformed(e: AnActionEvent) {
 21	 val project = e.project ?: return
 22	 val selectedFile = e.getData(CommonDataKeys.VIRTUAL_FILE)
 23	
 24	 // 如果没有选择文件，使用项目根目录
 25	 val targetDirectory = when {
 26	 selectedFile == null -> {
 27	 // 使用项目根目录
 28	 project.projectFile?.parent ?: project.workspaceFile?.parent ?: run {
 29	 Messages.showErrorDialog(project, "无法获取项目根目录", "错误")
 30	 return
 31	 }
 32	 }
 33	 selectedFile.isDirectory -> selectedFile
 34	 else -> selectedFile.parent ?: run {
 35	 Messages.showErrorDialog(project, "无法确定目标目录", "错误")
 36	 return
 37	 }
 38	 }
 39	 
 40	 // 显示 Feature 名称输入对话框
 41	 val dialog = FeatureNameDialog(project)
 42	 if (!dialog.showAndGet()) {
 43	 return
 44	 }
 45	 
 46	 val featureName = dialog.getFeatureName()
 47	 if (featureName.isBlank()) {
 48	 Messages.showWarningDialog(project, "Feature 名称不能为空", "输入错误")
 49	 return
 50	 }
 51	 
 52	 // 验证目录名称
 53	 val creatorService = DirectoryCreatorService.getInstance()
 54	 val (isValid, errorMessage) = creatorService.validateDirectoryName(featureName)
 55	 if (!isValid) {
 56	 Messages.showWarningDialog(project, errorMessage ?: "无效的目录名称", "输入错误")
 57	 return
 58	 }
 59	 
 60	 // 检查是否已存在同名目录
 61	 if (creatorService.checkDirectoryExists(targetDirectory, featureName)) {
 62	 val result = Messages.showYesNoDialog(
 63	 project,
 64	 "目录 '$featureName' 已存在，是否继续？\n\n这可能会在现有目录中创建新的子目录。",
 65	 "目录已存在",
 66	 Messages.getWarningIcon()
 67	 )
 68	 if (result != Messages.YES) {
 69	 return
 70	 }
 71	 }
 72	 
 73	 // 获取配置服务
 74	 val configService = StructureConfigService.getInstance()
 75	 val featureStructure = configService.getFeatureStructure()
 76	 
 77	 // 显示确认对话框
 78	 val structurePreview = creatorService.getStructurePreview(featureStructure, featureName)
 79	 val previewText = structurePreview.take(10).joinToString("\n") + 
 80	 if (structurePreview.size > 10) "\n... 还有 ${structurePreview.size - 10} 个目录" else ""
 81	 
 82	 val result = Messages.showYesNoDialog(
 83	 project,
 84	 "将创建 Feature 模块：$featureName\n\n" +

 87	 "是否继续？",

 123	 )

 126	 project,

 129	 )
 130	 }
 131	 }
 132	 )
 133	 }
 134	 })

 143	
 144	 // 只有在项目存在且选择了文件/目录时才启用

 146

 151	 e.presentation.text = "在此处创建 Feature 模块"
 152	 } else {

 154	 }

 1	package com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper.actions
 2	
 3	import com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper.services.DirectoryCreatorService
 4	import com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper.services.StructureConfigService
 5	import com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.AnAction
 6	import com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.AnActionEvent
 7	import com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.CommonDataKeys
 8	import com.intellij.openapi.progress.ProgressIndicator
 9	import com.intellij.openapi.progress.ProgressManager
 10	import com.intellij.openapi.progress.Task
 11	import com.intellij.openapi.ui.Messages
 12	import com.intellij.openapi.vfs.VirtualFile
 13	
 14	/**
 15	 * 创建 Clean Architecture 基础结构的 Action
 16	 */
 17	class CreateBaseStructureAction : AnAction() {
 18	 
 19	 override fun actionPerformed(e: AnActionEvent) {
 20	 val project = e.project ?: return
 21	 val selectedFile = e.getData(CommonDataKeys.VIRTUAL_FILE)
 22	
 23	 // 如果没有选择文件，使用项目根目录
 24	 val targetDirectory = when {
 25	 selectedFile == null -> {
 26	 // 使用项目根目录
 27	 project.projectFile?.parent ?: project.workspaceFile?.parent ?: run {
 28	 Messages.showErrorDialog(project, "无法获取项目根目录", "错误")
 29	 return
 30	 }
 31	 }
 32	 selectedFile.isDirectory -> selectedFile
 33	 else -> selectedFile.parent ?: run {
 34	 Messages.showErrorDialog(project, "无法确定目标目录", "错误")
 35	 return
 36	 }
 37	 }
 38	 
 39	 // 获取配置服务
 40	 val configService = StructureConfigService.getInstance()
 41	 val creatorService = DirectoryCreatorService.getInstance()
 42	 
 43	 // 获取基础结构配置
 44	 val baseStructure = configService.getBaseStructure()
 45	 
 46	 // 显示确认对话框
 47	 val structurePreview = creatorService.getStructurePreview(baseStructure)
 48	 val previewText = structurePreview.take(10).joinToString("\n") + 
 49	 if (structurePreview.size > 10) "\n... 还有 ${structurePreview.size - 10} 个目录" else ""
 50	 
 51	 val result = Messages.showYesNoDialog(
 52	 project,
 53	 "将在以下位置创建 Clean Architecture 基础结构：\n\n" +
 54	 "目标目录: ${targetDirectory.path}\n\n" +
 55	 "将创建的目录结构：\n$previewText\n\n" +
 56	 "是否继续？",
 57	 "创建 Clean Architecture 基础结构",
 58	 Messages.getQuestionIcon()
 59	 )
 60	 
 61	 if (result != Messages.YES) {
 62	 return
 63	 }
 64	 
 65	 // 在后台任务中创建目录结构
 66	 ProgressManager.getInstance().run(object : Task.Backgroundable(project, "创建 Clean Architecture 基础结构", true) {
 67	 override fun run(indicator: ProgressIndicator) {
 68	 indicator.isIndeterminate = false
 69	 indicator.fraction = 0.0
 70	 
 71	 val totalSteps = structurePreview.size
 72	 var currentStep = 0
 73	 
 74	 creatorService.createDirectoryStructure(
 75	 project = project,
 76	 baseDirectory = targetDirectory,
 77	 structure = baseStructure,
 78	 onProgress = { message ->
 79	 currentStep++
 80	 indicator.fraction = currentStep.toDouble() / totalSteps
 81	 indicator.text = message
 82	 },
 83	 onComplete = { success, errorMessage ->
 84	 if (success) {
 85	 Messages.showInfoMessage(
 86	 project,
 87	 "Clean Architecture 基础结构创建成功！\n\n" +
 88	 "位置: ${targetDirectory.path}\n" +
 89	 "共创建了 ${structurePreview.size} 个目录。",
 90	 "创建成功"
 91	 )
 92	 } else {
 93	 Messages.showErrorDialog(
 94	 project,
 95	 "创建 Clean Architecture 基础结构时发生错误：\n\n$errorMessage",
 96	 "创建失败"
 97	 )
 98	 }
 99	 }
 100	 )
 101	 }
 102	 })
 103	 }
 104	 
 105	 override fun update(e: AnActionEvent) {
 106	 val project = e.project
 107	 val selectedFile = e.getData(CommonDataKeys.VIRTUAL_FILE)
 108	
 109	 // 只要项目存在就显示菜单项
 110	 e.presentation.isVisible = project != null
 111	
 112	 // 只有在项目存在且选择了文件/目录时才启用
 113	 e.presentation.isEnabled = project != null && selectedFile != null
 114	
 115	 // 更新显示文本
 116	 if (selectedFile?.isDirectory == true) {
 117	 e.presentation.text = "创建 Clean Architecture 基础结构"
 118	 } else if (selectedFile != null) {
 119	 e.presentation.text = "在此处创建 Clean Architecture 基础结构"
 120	 } else {
 121	 e.presentation.text = "创建 Clean Architecture 基础结构"
 122	 }
 123	 }
 124	}

 271	 override fun isModified(): Boolean {
 272	 val currentBaseStructure = configService.getBaseStructure()
 273	 val currentFeatureStructure = configService.getFeatureStructure()
 274	 
 275	 val baseModified = baseStructureTextArea?.text != JsonFormatter.formatJson(currentBaseStructure.toJson())
 276	 val featureModified = featureStructureTextArea?.text != JsonFormatter.formatJson(currentFeatureStructure.toJson())
 277	 
 278	 return baseModified || featureModified
 279	 }
 280	 
 281	 override fun apply() {
 282	 val baseJsonText = baseStructureTextArea?.text ?: ""
 283	 val featureJsonText = featureStructureTextArea?.text ?: ""
 284	
 285	 // 验证 JSON 格式
 286	 if (!JsonFormatter.isValidJson(baseJsonText)) {
 287	 val error = JsonFormatter.getJsonError(baseJsonText)
 288	 Messages.showErrorDialog(
 289	 "基础结构配置 JSON 格式错误：\n$error",
 290	 "保存失败"
 291	 )
 292	 throw IllegalArgumentException("Invalid base structure JSON")
 293	 }
 294	
 295	 if (!JsonFormatter.isValidJson(featureJsonText)) {
 296	 val error = JsonFormatter.getJsonError(featureJsonText)
 297	 Messages.showErrorDialog(
 298	 "Feature 结构配置 JSON 格式错误：\n$error",
 299	 "保存失败"
 300	 )
 301	 throw IllegalArgumentException("Invalid feature structure JSON")
 302	 }
